issue.title: [Doc][C++] Document supported Parquet encryption features
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10941](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10941). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In ARROW-10918 we started documenting the Parquet format features supported by parquet-cpp, but I left a TODO for encryption features.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10941?focusedCommentId=17260725) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8974
